markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Limited">[Drow Shootist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=90)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Abomination Vaults</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 77</row>

Some [drow](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=37) take skill with the hand crossbow to new heights. You've learned the secrets of these fabled drow shootists. With fearlessness and swagger, you can accomplish amazing deeds with hand crossbows.

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).
